page.title: 13THE WORK OF THE POLICE.
page.content:
During the past few years Durham County Constabulary has tried to integrate it's policemen within the local communities. In Tow Law our "local" policeman is P.C. Hall.
{The policing of Tow Law and district {is controlled from the police-station {at Stanhope (9 miles), though there is {a station at Crook (4 miles). A total {of 8 constables and 1 sergeant are {responsible for the area.
{The policemen have to make sure that {everyone abides by the law. They also {spend a lot of their time helping {people with any problems they may {have.
Each policeman carries a pocket radio, pocket book, hand-cuffs (rarely used), truncheon, whistle and office keys.
